headline: How Recent Shifts In Expectations Are Rewriting The Story For Trade Desk (TTD)
summary: What Changed In The Latest Fair Value Update The latest update on Trade Desk brings a lower fair value estimate, moving from about US$61.12 per share to roughly US$53.94 per share, even though the discount rate used in the model sits at around 6.96% and the long term revenue growth assumption shifts only slightly from about 15.95% to roughly 15.91%. This reflects how recent Street research has turned more cautious, with several analysts focusing on uncertainties around future growth and...
